QuestData.Title: Dustwind Dig
QuestData.Description: I've got an idea, but it's a bit of a long shot. Thankfully, long shots happen to be a specialty of mine.$b$bNorth of here, the Explorers' League has uncovered a new set of titan ruins beneath the sands. If there's anything older and wiser than dragons, it's titans. Heck, I've heard rumors that the titans CREATED the dragons.$b$bTalk to Lead Prospector Durdin at the camp to the north. He'll have more information than I do about these titans.$b$bWhat did I tell you? It's a long shot.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Lead Prospector Durdin at Dustwind Dig in the Badlands.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Lead Prospector Durdin at Dustwind Dig in the Badlands.
QuestData.RewardText: Titans? You wanna know about titans?$b$bYou came to the right place, $g lad: lass;. We're on the brink of somethin' big.
